ComicInfo.Summary:
America’s longest-running satire magazine continues to skewer everything pop culture! MAD #30 features a wide variety of classic MAD movie and TV parodies. Plus, vintage MAD pop culture parodies and favorites like Spy vs. Spy, A MAD Look At… by Sergio Aragones, The Lighter Side Of… by Dave Berg, and much more from the Usual Gang of Idiots. MAD #30 will surely cure what ails you with a shot of humor in a jugular vein.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-01-18 22:55:11. [Issue ID 977518]
